name: Holy Poly!
description:
Holy Poly! is a 2D-platfromer game made using ONLY simple shapes

(because I'm not good at 2d art, pixel art or whatever I suck in art)

This ain't a game where you can have fun so go play some other game!

(Yeah I know what I'm saying..!)

Because, this is my first projects so, You can't expect much from this game!

So yeah! if you feel like giving it a try you CAN! I will be so happy to hear the comments!

Thank You!
